intro: Quelqu’un à l’air très balèze s’apporche de vous…

buck.intro_dialogue:
Oh, salut toi, je suis Cornil !$J’ai une bonne affaire à proposer
pour quelqu’un d’aussi costaud que toi !$J’ai deux Œufs de Pokémon sur moi,
et j’aimerais que quelqu’un prenne soin d’un.$Si t’arrives à me prouver que t’en est digne,
je te donne l’Œuf le plus rare !
buck.accept: Hé, hé hé ! Tu mets le feu !
buck.decline:
Hé ! Ton équipe
n’a pas l’air au meilleur de sa forme.$Attends, laisse-moi t’aider.

cheryl.intro_dialogue:
Hello, my name's Sara.$I have a particularly interesting request,
for a strong trainer such as yourself.$I'm carrying two rare Pokémon Eggs with me,
but I'd like someone else to care for one.$If you can prove your strength as a trainer to me,
I'll give you the rarer Egg!
cheryl.decline:
I understand, it looks like your team
isn't in the best condition at the moment.$Here, let me help with that.

marley.intro_dialogue:
…@d{64} I'm Viviane.$I have an offer for you...$I'm carrying two Pokémon Eggs with me,
but I'd like someone else to care for one.$If you're stronger than me,
I'll give you the rarer Egg.
marley.decline:
… I see.$Your Pokémon look hurt…
Let me help.

mira.intro_dialogue:
Hi! I'm Maïté!$Maïté has a request
for a strong trainer like you!$Maïté has two rare Pokémon Eggs,
but Maïté wants someone else to take one!$If you show Maïté that you're strong,
Maïté will give you the rarer Egg!
mira.decline:
Aww, no battle?
That's okay!$Here, Maïté will heal your team!

riley.intro_dialogue:
I'm Armand.$I have an odd proposal
for a strong trainer such as yourself.$I'm carrying two rare Pokémon Eggs with me,
but I'd like to give one to another trainer.$If you can prove your strength to me,
I'll give you the rarer Egg!
riley.accept:
That look you have...
Let's do this.
riley.decline: I understand, your team looks beat up.$Here, let me help with that.

title: Épreuve de valeur
description: Cette personne semble déterminée à vous donner un Œuf, qu’importe votre décision. Cependant, si vous parvenez à la battre, vous recevrez l’Œuf le plus rare.

1.label: Accepter le défi
